name: Rise of Hokage：Glory
description:
Massive Rewards giveaways will help you collect all your favorite ninjas and combine them into a powerful team!!

[No more lonely days!]
Our exclusive Group Battle Royale builds up the connection between players and offer lots of opportunities to socialize. Work as a team, participate in cross-server PVPs and seize ultimate glory!

[Casual Gameplay]
Collect tons of resources while idling. Cultivate your Ninja with ease. With casual idling gameplay, you can come and go as you please!

The Ninja hero has arrived! After 3 years apart, the Protagonist has grown a lot. If you were to play him again now, would you make different choices?
On the path of the Ninja, one faces countless obstacles and difficulties. Are you ready? Join us now and embark once again on a fantastical adventure!

[Tips]
